name: Parry Spell
text: You can throw an enemy spell back at its caster.
benefit: Whenever you successfully counter a spell, it returns back to its caster. This works exactly like the spell turning spell.
text_zh: 你能够将敌人的法术反射回它的施法者。
prerequisites_zh: 法术辨识15级，精通法术反制。
benefit_zh: 当你成功反制法术时，它会被反转至其施法者处。该专长与‘法术反转（spell turning）’法术完全一致。
